title: Black screen after champion select
body:
I've played LoL for 3 years and with the latest launcher I was having more and more bugs and crashes so I stopped playing. I started playing LoL this month and I can't play a single game without a fear of crash.

I join the Q, pick a champion and when the game starts loading it just pops black and only thing I see is the mouse and I can hear sounds but other is just black. I've uptaded my nvidia drivers like 3x in a week and it starts to piss me off. I have already 20 minutes low priority q on my main and 10 min. low priority on my other acc because of this.

Yesterday for example I was playing flex with 2 of my friends for 2 games just fine and when 1 of my friends went sleep we hit the solo/duo Q ranked and boom... black screen again so they remaked it and I got another leaver buster for this.

I often get a bug splat because of this.

Is it some kind of Virus ? I am already pissed off, every time getting leaverbuster because I can't even join the f*cking game because of some cheap programmers in Riot.

replies.body:
Your hardware or drivers could be acting up, so it was good that you updated them.  You've successfully connected to the game server, but something with your PC hardware or settings is failing to render the actual game.  You should run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out some additional possibilities.  

Getting a leaverbuster sucks and I feel your pain.  If you're having all of these combinations of issues, I highly advise against queuing for matchmade games and test in customs for now.
